nodes.name: workspace group
nodes.label: folders and files in the left column

nodes.name: playground editor
nodes.label: The group node for the.blu.json editor

nodes.name: editor
nodes.prompt:
This is the main software node editor. 

It allows to create new nodes, change layouts, add routing, add message busses etc.

nodes.name: context menu
nodes.label: right click context menus
nodes.prompt: This node will call the corresponding callback function for each context menu item.

nodes.name: path request
nodes.label: ask for filename to save
nodes.prompt: We use the callback parameter for this node, so we can disregard the path return message.

nodes.name: path request
nodes.label: add a file to the nodelib

nodes.name: clipboard
nodes.label: Used for clipboard exchange between several editors

nodes.name: application launcher
nodes.label: launches the app in a separate tab or an iframe
